Package de.parsemis.miner.environment

Contains settings and statistics handling.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GraphEnvironment<NodeType,EdgeType> This interface encapsulates the functionallity for a local and distributed (DataBase)Graph environment.
Relabler<NodeType,EdgeType> This interface maps to each node and edge label corresponding unique indices.
ThreadEnvironmentFactory<NodeType,EdgeType> This interface describes a factory for ThreadEnvironments
 

Class Summary
Debug This class collects/stores information about the configured debug level
LocalEnvironment<NodeType,EdgeType> This class is for locally storing all final settings, the database and the corresponding relabeling functions.
Settings<NodeType,EdgeType> This class is for parsing and initialising the console parameters and mining settings
SimpleRelabler<NodeType,EdgeType>  
Statistics This class is to store runtime statistic
ThreadEnvironment<NodeType,EdgeType> This class represents a thread local array pool (pooling not yet implemented)
 

Package de.parsemis.miner.environment Description

Contains settings and statistics handling.

The configuration for a mining run is done in a Settings object and cloned by the miner to a specialized LocalEnvironment for faster access.

Author:
Marc Woerlein (woerlein@informatik.uni-erlangen.de)
